description: meta info used internally by the nomad base infrastructure

metaInfos.description: A document containing files and directories
metaInfos.name: Archive

metaInfos.description: A compressed document using the bzip2 format
metaInfos.name: Bzip2Compressed

metaInfos.description: An output of a calculation (often partial)
metaInfos.name: CalculationOutput

metaInfos.description: A selection of documents that is stored as list of egids
metaInfos.name: CompactDocumentSelection

metaInfos.description: A compressed document
metaInfos.name: Compressed

metaInfos.description: Connection from a document to its contents
metaInfos.name: Containing

metaInfos.description: Connection from a document to a document partially derived from it
metaInfos.name: Derived

metaInfos.description: A document containing directory meta info in json format
metaInfos.name: DirectoryMetaInfo

metaInfos.description: A selection of documents
metaInfos.name: DocumentSelection

metaInfos.description: A selection of documents that is explicitly stored in the db as Containing connetions
metaInfos.name: ExplicitDocumentSelection

metaInfos.description: A normalized information about an Fhi Aims simulation.
metaInfos.name: FhiAimsNormalizedRunInfoV1_0

metaInfos.description: A compressed document using the gnu zip (gzip) format
metaInfos.name: GzipCompressed

metaInfos.description: A document in hdf5 format
metaInfos.name: Hdf5Document

metaInfos.description: An information document in hdf5 format, with properties, data and connections
metaInfos.name: Hdf5NomadInfo

metaInfos.description: An information document in hdf5 format, with properties, data and connections using the version 1.0 format
metaInfos.name: Hdf5NomadInfoV1_0

metaInfos.description: A trajectory in hdf5 format
metaInfos.name: Hdf5Trajectory

metaInfos.description: A trajectory in hdf5 format
metaInfos.name: Hdf5TrajectoryV1_0

metaInfos.description: An html document
metaInfos.name: HtmlDocument

metaInfos.description: A document containing an image
metaInfos.name: Image

metaInfos.description: An information document with properties, data and connections
metaInfos.name: InfoType

metaInfos.description: A document in json format
metaInfos.name: JsonDocument

metaInfos.description: An information document in json format, with properties, data and connections
metaInfos.name: JsonInfo

metaInfos.description:
The data part of an information document in json format.
      Together with an optional used_keys.json or all_keys.json that contains
      all possible keys, and a meta_keys.json (also optional) a self contained
      info can be built.
metaInfos.name: JsonInfoData

metaInfos.description: A document containing InfoKinds in json format
metaInfos.name: JsonInfoKinds

metaInfos.description: A trajectory in hdf5 format
metaInfos.name: JsonTrajectory

metaInfos.description: A normalized information about a simulation run using the version 1.0 format
metaInfos.name: NormalizedRunInfoV1_0

metaInfos.description: An output of a calculation as written by the calculation program (often partial)
metaInfos.name: RawCalculationOutput

metaInfos.description: Connection from a document to its replacement
metaInfos.name: Replaces

metaInfos.description: A selection of documents or pieces of documents
metaInfos.name: Selection

metaInfos.description: Connections used by the storage system
metaInfos.name: SystemConnections

metaInfos.description: A document containing files and directories stored in the tar format
metaInfos.name: TarArchive

metaInfos.description: A text document
metaInfos.name: TextDocument

metaInfos.description: A document containing block of timestamps
metaInfos.name: TimestampBlock

metaInfos.description: A trajectory, result of a simulation, can have a single or multiple configurations
metaInfos.name: Trajectory

metaInfos.description: An unknown document type
metaInfos.name: UnknownDocumentType

metaInfos.description: A list pieces of documents stored as nomad uris
metaInfos.name: UriSelection

metaInfos.description: A document containing a video
metaInfos.name: Video

metaInfos.description: An xml document
metaInfos.name: XmlDocument

metaInfos.description: A compressed document using the xz format
metaInfos.name: XzCompressed

metaInfos.description: A document containing files and directories stored in the zip format
metaInfos.name: ZipArchive
